00031 #include "egs_base_source.h"
00032 #include "egs_rndm.h"
00033 #include "egs_input.h"
00034 #include "egs_timer.h"
00035 
00036 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00037 
00038     if (argc < 2) {
00039         egsFatal("Usage: %s input_file\n",argv[0]);
00040     }
00041 
00042     EGS_Input input;
00043     input.setContentFromFile(argv[1]);
00044     EGS_BaseSpectrum *spec = EGS_BaseSpectrum::createSpectrum(&input);
00045     if (!spec) {
00046         egsFatal("Got null source\n");
00047     }
00048     egsInformation("Got spectrum of type %s\n",spec->getType().c_str());
00049 
00050     EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG();
00051 
00052     int ncase;
00053     int err = input.getInput("ncase",ncase);
00054     if (err) {
00055         ncase = 1000000;
00056     }
00057 
00058     EGS_Timer t;
00059     for (int j=0; j<ncase; j++) {
00060         spec->sampleEnergy(rndm);
00061     }
00062     EGS_Float cpu = t.time();
00063     egsInformation("CPU time: %g\n",cpu);
00064     spec->reportAverageEnergy();
00065 
00066     delete spec;
00067     delete rndm;
00068     return 0;
00069 
00070 }
